last_episode_to_air.name: Raiders of the Lost Arkus (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Skylanders race against time to stop Kaos from destroying the Core of Light, Strykore tries to pull Kaossandra back to the evil side.

name: Skylanders Academy
overview: Follow the heroic adventures of the Skylanders team, a group of heroes with unique elemental skills and personalities who travel the vast Skylands universe, protecting it from evil-doers and showing the next wave of Academy cadets how to do things the “Skylander way.”

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Skylander rookies Spyro, Stealth Elf and Eruptor learn all about protecting the Skylands from inept evil genius Kaos and the dangerous Doom Raiders.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2, Spyro tries to prove he has superpowers, a new cadet arrives at the Academy, Eruptor discovers a new skill and much more.

episodes.name: Skylanders Unite!
episodes.overview: The cadets come together for graduation day, but Spyro will need to overcome his bad attitude and big ego to join his friends as a Skylander.

episodes.name: My Way or the Sky Way
episodes.overview: Jet-Vac uses a potential plumbing disaster to teach Spyro about the "Skylander way," but they clash over Jet-Vac's strict rules and planning.

episodes.name: Missing Links
episodes.overview: When the Skylanders struggle to work as a team, sensei King Pen shows them how to build a new teammate that combines their talents.

episodes.name: Dream Girls
episodes.overview: Stealth Elf is chosen to give a speech to the entire academy, but first she has to figure out why everyone is suddenly terrified of sheep.

episodes.name: The Hole Truth
episodes.overview: The young Skylanders are assigned to spend a day as guards at Cloudcracker Prison, and the inmates try to trick the heroes into letting them escape.

episodes.name: Space Invaders
episodes.overview: Stealth Elf finds trouble when she gets stuck inside Kaos's mind, and she has to convince the others that she's trapped so they can help her escape.

episodes.name: Anger Mismanagement
episodes.overview: Eruptor goes to anger management when his temper puts missions at risk, but he'll need to tap back into his rage to get the Skylanders out of trouble.

episodes.name: Pop Rocks
episodes.overview: The young Skylanders learn that Pop Fizz used to be in a rock band with Wolfgang, who plans to turn fans at a music festival into an army of drones.

episodes.name: Beard Science
episodes.overview: Kaos thinks that the key to getting the Golden Queen to like him is to find some hair, so he steals Master Eon's treasured beard.

episodes.name: The Skylands Are Falling!
episodes.overview: An invention called the "evil-scope" allows the Skylanders to stop evil before it happens, but all the evil energy collects in a ball and traps Spyro.

episodes.name: Crash Landing
episodes.overview: After Crash Bandicoot is somehow transported into their world, the Skylanders have to help him get home by finding a dark relic.

episodes.name: Assault on Skylander Academy
episodes.overview: When Eon falls seriously ill, the Skylanders must race to find a light energy source to heal him. Meanwhile, the Doom Raiders attack the academy.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Skylander rookies Spyro, Stealth Elf and Eruptor learn all about protecting the Skylands from inept evil genius Kaos and the dangerous Doom Raiders.

episodes.name: Spyromania
episodes.overview: Spyro wants to prove that he has his own superpower like the other Skylanders, and he's going to need it when he gets into a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: I Dream of Ninjini
episodes.overview: Master Eon tells Stealth Elf to seek training from an elusive ninja genie giant named Ninjini, a once-great warrior who doubts her current abilities.

episodes.name: Return to Cynder
episodes.overview: A new cadet named Cynder becomes fast friends with Spyro at the Academy, but she questions whether she has what it takes to be a true hero.

episodes.name: Thankstaking for the Memories
episodes.overview: Spyro and Stealth Elf get locked in the Grand Library while everyone else is gone for a long holiday weekend.

episodes.name: Elementary, My Dear Eruptor
episodes.overview: Eruptor discovers he has the Sherlock Holmes-like ability to figure out who's guilty of committing evil deeds.

episodes.name: Split Decision
episodes.overview: When Skull decides to break away from Hex, Hex turns evil and tries to transform the others at the Academy into zombie-like drones.

episodes.name: The People vs. Pop Fizz
episodes.overview: Pop Fizz is arrested and put on trial for committing robberies all over the Skylands, and the other Skylanders have to help find the real culprit.

episodes.name: One Flu Over the Skylanders Nest
episodes.overview: Eon comes to the team house to lead training, but the house is quarantined and everyone ends up getting sick.

episodes.name: Belly of the Beast
episodes.overview: While fighting the evil Fire Viper, the gang ends up inside its belly and must put aside personal differences to find a way out.

episodes.name: Who's Your Daddy?
episodes.overview: When one of Jet-Vac's eggs hatches, he must try to be a good father to the baby inside. Kaos and Glumshanks believe they might be father and son.

episodes.name: Sheep(ball) Dreams
episodes.overview: Dreamcatcher gets amnesia, giving the Skylanders a chance to bring her back to the Academy and prevent her from returning to her evil ways.

episodes.name: It Techs Two
episodes.overview: Jet-Vac feels insecure about his role with the Skylanders when Sprocket is brought in and starts taking care of tech-related problems

episodes.name: Touch of Evil
episodes.overview: As he tries to learn more about his ancestors, Spyro searches for a dragon king, Kaos attempts to free an evil being that can rule the Sklands.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2, Spyro tries to prove he has superpowers, a new cadet arrives at the Academy, Eruptor discovers a new skill and much more.

episodes.name: Power Struggle
episodes.overview: The evil Strykore assigns Kaos and Dark Spyro to kidnap King Pen as part of a master plan to rule the Skylands. Stealth Elf befriends Kaossandra.

episodes.name: The Truth is in Here
episodes.overview: The Skylanders are pumped when Spyro returns to the Academy, but his old friends don't realize that he's up to something.

episodes.name: Sky Hard
episodes.overview: The Skylanders get a little too confident in their abilities after winning a big award for being the greatest heroes in the Skylands.

episodes.name: The Traitor Among Us
episodes.overview: When Eon increases his beardy sense, he discovers that there's a traitor at the Academy -- and Eruptor is convinced it's Kaossandra.

episodes.name: In Like Flynn
episodes.overview: Eon decides to bring on hotshot pilot Captain Flynn to help the team, only to discover that he might not live up to his legend.

episodes.name: Weekend at Eon's
episodes.overview: When Eon is knocked out by Food Fight, Jet-Vac and Spyro have to take over his body for a meeting with an important inspector.

episodes.name: Road Rage
episodes.overview: Strykore leaves a bracelet for Stealth Elf to find that will turn her evil, but it winds up on the wrong wrist.

episodes.name: Three Sides to Every Story
episodes.overview: Jet-Vac believes someone vaporized Master Eon, and his three main suspects are Eruptor, Spyro and Stealth Elf -- who each have differing stories.

episodes.name: Days of Future Crash
episodes.overview: Eruptor and Spyro need to talk to Crash Bandicoot, so they travel back in time to find him. But when they return, the present isn't like they left it.

episodes.name: Off to the Races
episodes.overview: The Skylanders try to take down Kaos and the Doom Raiders in a big race called the Skylands 500. But working together as a team proves difficult.

episodes.name: Split
episodes.overview: To cure Spyro of his darkness, the Skylanders will have to go on a dangerous mission to find the venom of a fire viper.

episodes.name: Raiders of the Lost Arkus (1)
episodes.overview: The Skylanders need to get to Arkus before Strykore and his minions, and a bold plan is the only way to pull it off.

episodes.name: Raiders of the Lost Arkus (2)
episodes.overview: As the Skylanders race against time to stop Kaos from destroying the Core of Light, Strykore tries to pull Kaossandra back to the evil side.
